sourcesContent:
// src/components/AdminDashboard.js import React from "react"; import "./AdminDashboard.css"; import { LineChart, Line, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, } from "recharts"; const analyticsData = { revenue: 12500, activeMembers: 47, attendanceToday: 38, membershipDistribution: [ { name: "Basic", value: 20 }, { name: "Premium", value: 15 }, { name: "Elite", value: 12 }, ], }; const attendanceTrend = [ { date: "Aug 1", checkins: 20 }, { date: "Aug 2", checkins: 25 }, { date: "Aug 3", checkins: 30 }, { date: "Aug 4", checkins: 28 }, { date: "Aug 5", checkins: 34 }, { date: "Aug 6", checkins: 38 }, ]; const COLORS = ["#8884d8", "#82ca9d", "#ffc658"]; const AdminDashboard = () => { return (

📊 Admin Analytics Dashboard

💰 Revenue

${analyticsData.revenue}

🏋️ Active Members

{analyticsData.activeMembers}

📅 Attendance Today

{analyticsData.attendanceToday}

📈 Attendance Trend

📊 Membership Plan Distribution

{analyticsData.membershipDistribution.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
